prompt: <description>**Part 1: Creating a 3D model of a rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center** The first part of the CAD model is a rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center. This part will require the creation of two faces: one with multiple lines and arcs, and the other with a single circle. **Face 1** 1. Create a new coordinate system with the following euler angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and translation vector: [0.0, 0.4688, 0.0]. 2. On this coordinate system, create a new sketch and draw the following shapes on the X-Y plane: 1. Line from point [0.0, 0.0] to point [0.3125, 0.0]. 2. Arc with start point [0.3125, 0.0], mid point [0.423, 0.0458], and end point [0.4687, 0.1562]. 3. Line from point [0.4687, 0.1562] to point [0.4687, 0.2187]. 4. Line from point [0.4687, 0.2187] to point [0.75, 0.2187]. 5. Line from point [0.75, 0.2187] to point [0.75, 0.3125]. 6. Line from point [0.75, 0.3125] to point [0.3125, 0.3125]. 7. Arc with start point [0.3125, 0.3125], mid point [0.202, 0.2667], and end point [0.1562, 0.1562]. 8. Line from point [0.1562, 0.1562] to point [0.1562, 0.0938]. 9. Line from point [0.1562, 0.0938] to point [0.0625, 0.0938]. 10. Line from point [0.0625, 0.0938] to point [0.0625, 0.4688]. 11. Line from point [0.0625, 0.4688] to point [0.0, 0.4688]. 12. Line from point [0.0, 0.4688] to point [0.0, 0.0]. The loop consists of 12 lines. **Face 2** 1. Create a new sketch on the same coordinate system as Face 1. 2. On this new sketch, draw a circle with center point [0.3125, 0.1562] and radius 0.0937. The loop consists of 1 circle. After creating these two faces, scale the sketch by 0.75. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model with a depth of 0.4687 towards the normal and no extrusion in the opposite direction. The scaling parameter for the sketch should be 0.75. The boolean operation for this part should result in the creation of a new solid body. The dimensions of this intermediate part are as follows: - Length: 0.75 - Width: 0.4688 - Height: 0.75</description>
